websiteDescription: Crafting digital experiences that captivate and convert.
author: Kashish Verma

projects.title: EcoShop - Sustainable E-commerce
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform specializing in eco-friendly and sustainable products. Features include advanced filtering, carbon footprint tracking, and sustainability scoring for each product.

projects.title: FitTrack Pro - Fitness Companion
projects.description: An advanced fitness tracking application that combines workout logging, nutrition planning, and social features. Users can set goals, track progress, and connect with fitness communities.

projects.title: Revibe - Mental Wellness Hub
projects.description: A comprehensive mental health platform offering daily affirmations, mood tracking, guided meditations, and personalized wellness plans to promote overall mental well-being.

projects.title: FoodieConnect - Restaurant Discovery
projects.description: Social dining platform that helps users discover local restaurants, share reviews, make reservations, and connect with fellow food enthusiasts in their area.

projects.title: HealthHub - Telemedicine Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive telehealth solution connecting patients with healthcare providers through secure video consultations, prescription management, and health record tracking.
